t: Herbie Nichols Trio - Amazon.com Music
s: Herbie Nichols has seldom gotten the recognition he deserves, so it's great to see Blue Note including him in its recent vinyl reissue programs, first with "The Prophetic Herbie Nichols, vols. I and II" (issued on one LP as part of the Blue Note Classics series) and now with this fine release.
